Enum FileReadMode

  • Defined in File utils.h

Enum Documentation

enum class FileReadMode

Specifies the mode for reading file content.

Values:

enumerator FULL

Read entire file.

enumerator TAIL

Read last N lines of file.

enumerator SMART

Read last N lines, fall back to full file if pattern not found.
